name: Brave Seller
description:
Get resources at night and try to sell it during daytime!
Controls:
WASD - Movement
Shift - Sprint
Mouse - Aiming
LMB - Shoot
1,2,3,4... - Choose item from inventory
Approach the table and choose an item to sell it. 

Here is our little project that we submitted to #BTPGameJam. We did it in less than a week. Hope you like it!

Credits:
Programing, art etc. - Michał Kaleta and Michał Więcek
Music - Airtone - Night Rain
